page.title: 14The Comunity Centre
page.content: Within the village of Evenwood there has recently opened a Community Centre.This centre is in what used to be the old primary school.When a new school was built work was begun on the old one to convert it into the centre. The centre which is now fully operational provides many varied activities for the people of the area. Some of the activeties organised are luncheon clubs etc. for the elderly, adult literacy classes,art classes, flower arranging etc.For the young people they have junior and senior youth clubs,discos,play groups and dancing classes. Also incorparated within the site is the county lending libary for the town.This is open twice a week on Tuesdays and Fridays.The community centre is a very well supported local facilty.
